au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig

Interface IAction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAccessAction, IActivityDetectorAction, INotifyAction, IResetAction, ISlaveAccessAction, ITestAction

    public interface IAction
    Action interface used for type safety. An action is an task to perform some objective (the action type) on a single device.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getActionType()
      Returns the action type of implementing classes.
      java.lang.String getFailureReason()
      Gets the reason why the action has failed.

    • Method Detail

      • getActionType

        java.lang.String getActionType()
        Returns the action type of implementing classes.
        Returns:
        action type

      • getFailureReason

        java.lang.String getFailureReason()
        Gets the reason why the action has failed. Returns null if the action has succeeded.
        Returns:
        failure reason
